author: GameSpot
description:
On this week's episode of The GameSpot Show, Dan Ryckert calls in from the Nintendo Switch 2 event, Jordan talks through his South of Midnight review, and Kurt puts together a Doom: The Dark Ages trivia game for Jake.

0:00 - The GameSpot Show Intro
0:51 - Dan Ryckert Talks About The Nintendo Switch
2:47 - All The Games We Missed This Week
3:48 - South of Midnight Review
19:42 - Adding South Of Midnight To The Ranking Board
22:19 - Doom: The Dark Ages
29:40 - Jake's Video About Doom: The Dark Ages 

#thegamespotshow #gamespot #nintendoswitch #nintendoswitch2 #nintendo #switch2 #southofmidnight #doomdarkages
title: The Switch 2, South of Midnight, and Doom: The Dark Ages | The GameSpot Show

author: GameSpot
description:
Nintendo's Switch 2 Direct was packed with announcements, including major details about the next-gen Nintendo Switch console, upcoming Switch 2 games, returning fan favorites, and exciting hardware features. Whether you're hyped for new releases or curious about backwards compatibility, Jeff Grubb and Lucy James break it all down in this in-depth reaction and analysis.

Don't miss our expert insights on everything revealed during the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct!

#NintendoSwitch2 #Switch2Direct #Gamespot #Nintendo

0:00 - How Much is the Nintendo Switch 2
4:00 - New Games
11:40 - Zelda is Back!
13:00 - Upcoming Games
title: Everything You Need To Know From The Nintendo Switch 2 Direct

author: GameSpot
description:

Schedule (Times listed in PST)

10am - The GameSpot Show
10:45pm - Verdansk Returns in Call of Duty Warzone (Let's Play)
12pm - Voicemail Dump Truck
title: 🔴LIVE! SWITCH 2 HANDS-ON, South of Midnight Review | POWER BLOCK 4/03/25

author: GameSpot
description:
We sat down with MoonHood Studios to get an exclusive hands-on look to its debut cozy horror game The Midnight Walk.

The Midnight Walk is the debut game from studio MoonHood Studios. Kurt Indovina sat down with its directors Olov Redmalm and Klaus Lyngeled to see the cozy horror game in all its spooky handmade glory. That's right — handmade. Every asset of the game is handmade out of clay, and then 3D scanned into the game. The Midnight Walk is expected to release for PC and PlayStation 5, and is also PSVR2 compatible.

#midnightwalk #GameSpot
title: Hands-On With The Midnight Walk, A Cozy Horror Game Made Out Of Clay

author: GameSpot
description: Dan Ryckert got hands-on time with the Switch 2 at a preview event in New York. He gives his impressions of his first time with the system as well as the many games he played, including Metroid Prime 4, Mario Kart World, Mario Party Jamboree, and Donkey Kong Bananza.
title: The Nintendo Switch 2 - First Impressions
